data.name: Art of Combat
data.description:
The most advanced VR fighting game to date! Fight against 12 unique fighters with a complete set of martial arts techniques and combos, and 15 different special powers.
Feel a stunning immersive martial arts combat experience that will make other fighting games bite the dust!
To defeat your enemies, you'll have to adapt to each opponent style. You will have to train your striking, evasion, blocking and specials powers skills to become the toughest martial arts master in the world.
Improve your stamina, body strength and technique while you have a great fighting time.
Unleash the dragon inside you!

translations.long_description:
¡El juego de lucha más avanzado hasta la fecha! Pelea contra 12 luchadores únicos con un juego completo de técnicas de artes marciales y combos, y 15 poderes especiales diferentes.
¡Siente una experiencia de combate increíble que hará morder el polvo a otros juegos de lucha!
Para derrotar a tus enemigos, tendrás que adaptarte a cada uno de sus estilos. Tendrás que entrenar tus habilidades de golpeo, esquiva, bloqueo y poderes especiales para convertirte en el luchador más duro del mundo.
Mejora tu estamina, fuerza corporal y técnica mientras disfrutas de un gran tiempo de combate.
¡Desata el dragón que hay en ti!

changelog.change_log: Leaderboards, haptics improvements and performance improvements
General optimizations and achievements added to the game

Improve combat environments and recreated dragon mountains environment, config music flag stops music in all game, stop slash move when hit opponent and you are moving in his direction, correct double player push in some situations, limit the opponents that can be selected at easy and medium levels

- Increase movement velocity
- Reduce difficulty of specials:
	* allow specials while moving
	* increase toguether hands distance
	* remove grab buttons from specials
- Show the status bar continously and allow configurate lookup if desired
- Reduce number of combats at easy 2 and medium 4

- Increase movement velocity
- Reduce difficulty of specials:
	* allow specials while moving
	* increase toguether hands distance
	* remove grab buttons from specials
- Show the status bar continously and allow configurate lookup if desired
- Reduce number of combats at easy 2 and medium 4

- Now the timeout for a special starts when the movement of the hands reach step 2 not when triggers are pressed. This makes much easier to perform specials!
- Combats start with full mana for player and opponent. Life is nicer with special powers since the begining!
- Stun effect for player improved

Listening to users feedback we have:

- Simplified and shorten initial tutorial.
- Change specials tutorials flow to make clearer the movements required for each special.
- Make bigger and more visible in combat specials tutorial guide movements to improve the learn curve of specials.
- Add a voice warning of no mana when you try to execute an special without mana.
- Make easier to make specials in combat. Now the special is not cancelled when player get hit or hit himself the opponent

- Opponents IA improvements against player high pressure attacks
- Imporve tutorial
- Improve user initialization
